reviews.review:
在这里，我以一个新手的角度去评测这个游戏，那些之前玩家 评测的平衡性什么的我不了解也不讨论，这两天万圣节打折，正好之前对这个游戏感兴趣就趁着这次打折入了，再买这前看到玩家们的评测大多都是不推荐这款游戏 ，其原因大多就是优化差，平衡性差。
这对我这种娱乐玩家来说都不重要，于是还是入了这个游戏，从进游戏就真切的体会到优化是不太好，为此还专门去网上找游戏卡帧的解决办法，最后终于算是有点成效，不是那么卡了，不影响基本的游戏体验，可能和大多数新手一样，被各种怼，然后我就想是不是太心急了，没做新手教程就直接开始游戏，我就想做一下新手教程熟悉一下游戏，结果我发现这个游戏没有新手 教程，就只有几个给新手看的短片，我心想算了，没有就没有，自己一点点摸索，因为开始总玩人类，都是匹配5分钟，存货30秒的那种，我就决定玩屠夫，想着杀光他们，然后悲剧就来了，我用的隐身屠夫，但是我总感觉人类可以看到我 ，他们离得远远地就看着我，我一靠近他们就放下一块板子，然后靠这块板子周旋，我去踹板子他们就跑没影了。再后来我发现我一个屠夫径直赛跑跑不过人类，我心想肯定是遇到老司机了，还在吐槽游戏的匹配设置，但是当到游戏结算界面的时候我才知道，什么都是放屁，什么老司机，高手，滚一边去，就是一群改档的煞笔，20段全满级技能，他们那是不是外挂我不知道，我只知道他们这样我没法玩，我不怕被虐，不怕输，但是我怕被不公平对待，都是花钱玩的游戏，凭什么他们开挂逍遥法外，我就去网上查关于这个游戏外挂的一些问题，发现好像这个游戏外挂横行有一段时间了，也没人管，所以我选择放弃，游戏那么多凭什么就跟他玩命呢，我说这么多就是想告诉那些对这个游戏感兴趣，但是还没买的玩家说，可惜的好游戏，他并不值得你去为它花钱，因为他不会让你开心。
THE BEST AROUND!
好玩   就是现在玩麦克匹配不到人啊  坑坑坑
Играл давно игра гoвнo

游戏的创意不错，猫抓老鼠的规则简单易上手。气氛营造也不错，刚玩的确是紧张。不像一般的恐怖游戏，跳出个什么吓你一跳，这里能吓到你的只能是屠夫，另一个玩家。
这个游戏我玩了300+小时，还没开始玩屠夫，值回票价的。现在万圣节打折57 还是不错值得入手的。只是现在人类跟屠夫确实不平衡。以后应该会调整

Desbalanceado , si el asesino es novato o le haces perder tiempo , te campea ( se queda parado delante tuyo o inspeccionando a tus alrededores para agarrar al que te venga a salvarte) y de esa forma no dejara que te salven hasta que te mueras ,despídete de tus objetos, ofrendas, accesorios ,y si no hiciste mucho durante la partida tendrás poco puntaje y bajaras de rango, por otra parte si te toca alguien que sepa jugar dejara que te salven porque obtendrá mas puntos al haber  persecución, ataque, enganche, desangrado, etc. 
Hay asesinos se lagea para ganar, ya que él es el host y no hay manera de ver el lag, solo podemos probar en el chat, si se demora en mostrar lo que escribiste es que es un lag y cuando empiece la partida será aún peor, otros lo que hacen es lagearse cuando empiece la partida, de esa manera uno no se da cuenta por medio del chat.
Recomiendo que juegues con amigos, si juegas solo tú, te tocan supervivientes que se desconectan, no saben jugar, si eres rango 1 te tocaran gente que sabe jugar ,pero me ha pasado a veces que yo y el asesino somos rango 1 mientras los demás son rango 20 (noobs) y tú solo no puedes hacer todo.
Depende te tu país ,zona horaria para que encuentres gente, no es un juego que juegues con personas de todo el mundo ya que no hay servidores, un ejemplo si es de noche y en tu país no hay mucha gente jugando ,el juego buscara usuarios en un rango más amplio que ya no solo sean personas de tu país y así sucesivamente, hasta que encuentre supervivientes si eres asesino, en el caso de supervivientes es más fácil encontrar asesinos pero ya sabes a lo que te enfrentas(lag,camp,etc).
Agrego:
El juego se vuelve repetitivo, al principio te va a encantar pero con el tiempo ya te vas dando cuenta, ejemplo:
El asesino: Generadores, persecución, atacar, enganchar, matar.
Superviviente: generadores, sigilo, persecución, escapar o morir
El juego se centra en la persecución, encuentras lo divertido en eso, nada más.
Si juegas como asesino te costara tiempo acostumbrarte con cada personaje, encontraras gente que sepa jugar, lugares de trolleo donde te hacen perder mucho tiempo, gente que te va a fregar cada rato con la linterna, que se hagan más rápido con la caja de herramientas, que son equipo y se hablan con un programa externo y les informan donde estas, etc.
Tendrás que usar ofrendas, accesorios, habilidades para contrarrestar al superviviente.
Como superviviente tendrás que saber esconderte, lugares donde podrás escapar, hacerle perder tiempo, trabajar en equipo ,hacer generadores sin fallar, enfrentarte a asesinos tramposos que campean, se lagean, etc. 
Mejor jugar con amigos en equipo para tener un mejor desempeño durante la partida, pero del asesino no se sabe cómo te va a tocar.
越改越难玩，游戏完全不平衡，新屠夫无敌，排队10分钟，游戏3分钟，还有就是改档改血点外挂特别多，屠夫把把红处决玩个球

Absolute garbage. The game used to be fun but now it is dogshit. Go buy Bad Rats instead.

After so many hours, I STILL find it adrenaline-inducing as a survivor main. I also love that they make more exciting perks these days - that's one huge motivator to keep playing. And, in the end, I think the game is still generally fun for me as a survivor main, although both killers and survivors have all gotten better at the game, so I get fucked a lot since I'm bad. 

I know that this game has problems. Getting camped still sucks. Toxicity is never going to go away. DBD devs break something every single update. I don't know enough about the balance changes to comment... but in the end, I'm still having fun. I can quit for a few months, and I'll come back, and I'll have fun again. Very few games can do that for me. Plus I've made many great memories here. 

I would recommend it. I like it.

DBD is like a corpse. The bones that make up the game are there, but the flesh is rotting away. Pointless ranking system, history of bugs that should have been fixed before relase, and now a pay to win system with the new character updates. Worth it if its on sale and with friends, but stand alone as a game it's not worth it.

Update 1.21 - release a dlc that costs $7 with a killer that is too fucking overpowered for this game. This game isn't even fun anymore and i wouldn't recomend buying it because the developers became sellouts. 
Note: THIS GAME IS A PAY TO WIN

Okay, here's the deal. 4v1 games like this are always a risk, but I feel like this game is a good investment. I started playing during the free weekend in August, and I've been hooked (ahaha ow) ever since. 

For me, the game never goes stale. I've had amazing games where I escape by the skin of my teeth. I've had games that have left me screaming with frustration. The matches have been mostly positive, though there are always going to be issues with other people. 
- Camping killers are an issue, but what can you do? That's just people being people. Yelling at them just encourages them, so don't waste your time.
- Cheaters are around too, but I've only encountered one or two in the months I've been playing. I may just be lucky on that part. 
- The controls can be a little weird, especially the quick-time stuff, but it just takes a few rounds to get used to.
- I've had issues with parts of the map not quite loading, but those are usually fixed with the updates.

I don't mean to rattle on, but this is one of the most addicting games I've played in a long time. If you're looking for a spooky game that keeps you on your toes and you don't mind playing with people (who may or may not be jerks), then this is the game for you. But if you don't like losing matches or getting mad when altruism isn't at its highest, you might be better off looking somewhere else. Good luck!

Severly dissapointed in this game. As a serial killer myself the lack of option to kill my victims leaves me somewhat underwhelmed in a sense. I remember the first time I blended the eye of a victim while he watched with his other, and the time I impaled a young girl on a sharpened pool cue in my basement, the look of fear in their eyes was on a different level and frankly not being able to use my enviroment more is somewhat angering. Futhuermore why must I always sacrifice to this "entity"? personally I perfer vishnu however that is only because He has done things for me in return. All in all I just wish for the option to consume my victims in a realistic way, thankyou - Concerned Serial Murderer

My biggest complaint about this game is the fact that they don't place you in lobbies that match your rank. I'm a rank 18 survivor, but I've been running into rank 1 killers which is extremely unfair. I am a rank 16 killer, vut I've been running into rank 1 survivors which is also unfair. Another would be that they give you a chance to wiggle out of the killers grasp, but there are always three hooks not too far away from where you got knocked down. Please, developers, remove some hooks. I, by no means, hate this game. I think it's a really fun game. I enjoy every match I play (yes, even the unfair matches). I just think that there are some things that need to be tweaked a little. I recommend this game.

A couple months ago I would have said it is a must buy, but the game is in this stage dead. The new DLCs are for me just jokes. THe matchmaking is not that good either the Killer is too good for me (average player) and some are so dumb that you go from generator to generator and end  the game in 5min.
While it does have its crashes and match making issues, it is pretty good in its current state.  Killer selection is very diverse now, and there are tons of perks to chose from.

マッチングも改善され、待つ時間も短くなりました。
とても、シンプルで面白いゲームでおすすめします。

今回のハロウィンのアップデートでのキラー側のマイケルは、強すぎです。
脱出がかなり難しい。
修正してほしいです。

Não perca seu tempo jogando isso, sério.
O pior é a comunidade que quer te dizer como jogar, falando o que você PODE fazer ou não (principalmente jogando de Killer), ao mesmo tempo que é tóxica pra caralho e 90% troll. Ao mesmo tempo que os survivors querem te ensinar a jogar, falando o que você pode fazer ou não, eles são trolls, te travam toda hora, tem vantagens absurdas de quebradas, etc.
O pior de tudo é ver o jogo incentivando isso, incentivando você a ser um filho da puta, troll, etc, colocando cada vez mais mecânicas que facilitam a vida de gente assim, gente essa que representa 90% da comunidade que joga esse game.
Sem contar os cheaters, galera que usa cheats que aumentam a velocidade do survivor de forma quase imperceptível, mas que você acaba percebendo numa Chase, aí no final você denuncia e NADA acontece, no dia seguinte você cai com a MESMA PESSOA e ela usa cheat de novo. É nítido que a Behaviour quer sua grana e foda-se o balanceamento do game, foda-se anti cheat (que existe, mas é tão útil quanto óculos pra cego). Sem contar outras práticas absurdas no game como vender um personagem NFT….preciso nem continuar.
Não vou mentir que me diverti bastante jogando o game, até zerar as classificações e eu, que tenho nem 30h de jogo, começar a cair com maluco de mais de 1.000h de jogo, em time e troll. O jogo enfia o balanceamento no rabo, é incrível isso, ao mesmo tempo que incentiva comportamentos extremamente tóxicos, deixam os jogadores abusarem das mecânicas do game que são quebradas (propositalmente ou não, não me surpreenderia se fosse) e fazem uma puta vista grossa fudida pra quem usa cheat.
Normalmente faço lista bonitinha, dando notas pras partes técnicas, pra dizer se recomendo o game ou não. Mas esse jogo aqui é impossível fazer isso já que nem parte técnica posso dizer que ele tem, de tão mal feito ele é em todos os aspectos. Duvida? Abre o jogo e vê a resolução dele.

4 Survivor verirrten sich auf ein fremdes Gelände und versuchten mit Hilfe der Generatoren, den Ausgang zu finden.
Sie wußten aber nicht, dass dieses Gelände noch bewohnt ist.
Als der erste Generator lief, ahnten Sie nicht, dass sie jemand auf sich aufmerksam gemacht haben.
Auf diesem Gelände lebt ein Mensch, der durch das verdreckte Ökosystem verunstaltet und deformiert wurde.
Der Zorn war natürlich groß, als Er mitbekam, was auf seinem Gelände vor sich ging.
Diese Generatoren waren bewußt ausgeschaltet, weil sie die Umwelt verschmutzten.
Und somit begann der Kampf, ums Überleben.

Mit dem neuen DLC Michael Myers, haben sie noch Pep in dieses Spiel gebracht.
Kauft es euch, mit Freunden macht es noch mehr Spaß

Great game that has potential, but is full of idiots and campers.  One example of this is the killer camping the hooks, if you do not bait with 2 or more, you will die.  Another is that some people do not know how to juke and will bring the killer towards you/ screw up on a generator skill check point and cause a loud bang.  Many newbie mistakes which cause the game to be very difficult.  From personal experience this game can be an angry one or fun and exciting with thrills.  I just find it annoying how the developers do not even test their own game for bugs before releasing new content, it's like they want to piss us off.  That is why the community is shit. Rate 6/10.

Let me start off by saying I was worried about this game, I was burned in the past with the whole player vs monster theme (Evolve) but this game handles it so great. I went from being cautiously optimistic about this game to it being one of my favorite games to play, on any platform. 

The developers have created a pretty unique world, with some really cool characters. I like how they focused on creating their own world with each character having unique perks, fixing bugs, adding in things, etc.. before they went with a licensed DLC. With that, I am referring to the Halloween/Michael Myers pack that was released. IMO, it was very smart to do this with the Friday the 13th game coming out next year, helps this game compete. 

My only complaint about this game is I wish it had dedicated servers instead of P2P connections. This would solve the lag and disconnects , that happen sometimes. Otherwise, the game is an absolute blast.

If you have friends to play with it's definitely worth picking up and honestly even if you don't you should still get it. This game is very unique with a fresh take on 4v1 , in its own unique world. 

I plan to play it for a very long time.


EDIT: A year later and it's still one of my favorite games.

Es bastante bueno si quieres pasar un rato, es mejor con amigos, aunque llega a ser algo cansado despues de jugar 5 partidas, tiene buenos graficos, esta muy bien optimizado.
Lo malo es que los servidores son muy malos, los mapas son exactamente iguales solo cambia el ambiente y una casa a excepcion de algunos mapas claro, hay asesinos que estan bastante top, y algunos jugadores (no todos) son una mierda ya que si el asesino esta perdiendo y se sale, no te dan los puntos obtenidos y asi nos joden la partida, eso se tiene que arrglerar.

Lo recomiendo para pasar un rato, sobretodo con amigos porque es algo aburrido jugarlo solo.
Well, I don't have that many hours, but it's a really great and fun game, especially with friends. Some killers maybe could be a little bit stronger but it's awesome.

Předražené DLC, nevybalancované matche, občas FPS dropy, není to hororovka ( :D ), a některé postavy by potřebovaly masivní nerf. Hra je sračka ... fakt .. lidi.. jestli si chcete ničit nervy hrajte radši Dark Souls, to má alespoň smysl.


Update:

Hra je stále unbalanced píčovina :) kdy vás budou neustále campit německé hentai děti :) nemluvě o rychlosti přidávaných DLC, které přidávají větší a jednodušší postavy. :)))))))))) Konzolová píčovina :)



Update  no.3

Nový killer, stále kokotina pro konzolisty, kteří si vzájemně lížou anály. Hru bych nedoporučil ani nejhoršímu nepříteli natož jako ,,SUPER PARTY GAME''. Doufám, že to brzo zdechne a navždy na tuto hru všichni zapomeneme.



Update no. 4

Nechápu jak vůbec někdo může tuhle hru nominovat na ocenění. Zajebaná komunita této hry, unballanced postavy x killeři. Doufám že nezdechne jen ta hra, ale i to studio, které tuto kokotiny mají ve vývoji. GG vývojáři, vyvinuli jste kokotinu století. V životě v téhle hře nikdo nedostal postih za nesportovní chování. GG škoda že nejde REFUND.


Update no.5

Hra po přidání zadarmo na EPIC Games konečně snad zdechla. Hurá :)


Update no.6
Hru jsem spustil do delší době a chce se mi zvracet. Hra vás postupně nutí si kupovat DLC, je proto, aby jste se vyrovnali vyhoněným NERDIKŮM, kteří mámě kradli kreditku a mohli si koupit nového killera. Jestli tahle hra někoho baví tak je buď vyšinutý blázen a nebo miluje sračky. Tuny sraček :)

This game is the biggest shit show I have ever played.

If I could describe this game to you it's like that Spiderman meme where two Spidermans are pointing at eachother. Let me explain.


[u] Survivor Side [/u]

Playing survivor is really just a gamble, most of the time you are either

- Get a killer that hardcore camps and tunnels people leading to a unenjoyable time

- You get a survivor/survivors that d/c or kill themselves on the hook leading to a unenjoyable time

- Constantly getting Nurses and Blights gets very repetitive leading to a bad time

Thus survivors just end up running the meta perks because it's really the only way people are able to actually play the game and have a good time.


[u] Killer side [/u]

- You have to pretty much camp and tunnel people because the game is pretty unbalanced and it's really the only way killers are able to win but it isn't fun for both sides, leading to a unenjoyable time

- You get a whole team that runs the same four perks leading to a unbalanced mess if you aren't playing Nurse or Blight leading to a unenjoyable time

- You get survivors that are really toxic because the last match, they had a camping, tunneling, NOED running Legion so they want release that anger on you. Leading to a unenjoyable time

- You get swf's (People playing together) that are using Discord which the game wasn't balanced for. Leading to the killer having.... a unenjoyable time

[u] Conclusion [/u]

This game is basically are war between two sides. Killers are hating survivors who are using meta perks, but survivors are running meta perks because people don't get a chance to play the game if they don't use these perks.

This is the one game I have ever played, where even if you don't take the game seriously it still makes you feel like garbage.

Now there is hope in the horizon with the rework of 39 perks and the cut down on the grind, but it won't stop killers from camping and tunneling and survivors running all meta and being toxic.

And as someone who has played on and off since 2016 nothing much has changed.

This game and only this game I will say this.

This game is a shit show.
Its good game but there is a lot of bugs.
I like it.
Now I can chase people with a machete in-game to prevent myself from going on foamy-mouthed murderous rampages in real life! Thanks, Dead by Daylight!
Tons of fun. git gud
This game could have been so much more. But every time the devs release a patch or an update, some parts of the game were almost guaranteed to go wrong. Disappointing.

The new ranking system has made the game kinda skuzzy. The only way non-talented killers win is by tunneling and focusing you out of the game -and as this is a cross-platform game now, there are many console players that just aren't up to the task.  Sitting in a lobby for 4 minutes, to then be found by the killer and caught (because you will be due to the mechanics) and then you spend the rest of the game on the hook or temporarily off the hook just to go back on the hook and be removed from the game.  This is not fun.  The only way this game is fun is by playing with others and being on DISCORD (which is a sort of way of cheating because there's not supposed to be any communication between survivors)

this game, although I still play it, I would not recommend until the developers fix their major issues that they've introduced into the game.

First of all, I would recommend buying this game, probably with a couple of friends in a sale, but the game is an awesome idea with or without friends. You have these killer abilities you have to learn, some perks on survivor you have to use before you really understand them. And there are these awesome developers that listen to the community and interact with you (Whats really rare nowadays). But there are a lot of bugs still in the game that probably will get fixed but just play around them and you'll be fine. 400+ Hours and I'm still learning. 9.5/10

I have played this game only a few times. Whenever you play as a survivor it is the most intense feeling ever being chased by the killer. It is definitely a game that should be played with friends if you don't want to play with strangers.
Nice game.

Un jeu franchement au top, que tout les adepte de frissons aimeront. Je l'ai seulement que depuis quelques jours et j'adore. Seulement on peut voir que le matchmaking est vraiment long parfois, je pense plus que cela est du a ma connexion (mais aussi au jeu). Les gens qui crachent sur le jeu car un nouveau tueur est sortie, et bien il vous faudra juste réesayer et c'est tout, sa rajoute du piment au jeu. Et puis le but d'être survivant en théorie est d'avoir une faible chance de s'en sortir, et non de gagner à chaque fois.

Das Spiel macht wirklich Spaß und auch teilweise süchtig! :-)

Einziges Manko:

Die Entwickler haben keine eigenen Server zur Verfügung gestellt. Das Server ist sozusagen der Killer. Wenn der Killer zu weit weg sitzt, z.B. in Amerika , dann hat man als Überlebender in Deutschland große Lags, die einem das Überleben sehr erschweren. 

Beim rennen z.B. rennt man gerade aus und im nächsten Moment hängt man an der Wand...
das ist wirklich sehr nervig und trübt den Spielspaß ein wenig...

Es wäre besser wenn die Entwickler eigene Server für ein Match zur Verfügung stellen würden, dann haben die Survivor auch keine Lags mehr.

Последнее обновление Х+У-ЙНЯ полная.
Когда нет сил играть в Команде с аутистами и ты выходишь из игры, то получаешь ещё и БАН на 5 минут
С каждым обновлением все хуже и хуже. Скоро будут банить за не правильные мувы и быстрый завод генераторов...
Очень интересная игра.Советую поиграть
